definition: simple and unadorned (of art, architecture etc)

sentences.english: The Seal, solid in configuration, is simple and honest, majestic and supreme.

sentences.english: With its simple artistic style and layout of the science and art of famous in the world.

sentences.english: This chair was novel in its combination of visually austere form with high-level seating comfort.
sentences.chinese: 這張椅子的新穎之處在於它古樸的造型及舒適的坐感。

sentences.english: The ancient simple pile-dwellings of Miao lie on the green slopes.
sentences.chinese: 古樸的吊角樓斜倚在綠色的山坡上。

sentences.english: For millennia, Han Chinese clothing retained its simple and elegant style.
sentences.chinese: 幾千年來，漢服保留了其古樸典雅的風格。

sentences.english: XX has characteristic in Chinese traditional residence with its black brick, simple and unsophisticated and elegance.

sentences.english: The fruit of the cupuaçu tree is a source of oil celebrated for its moisturizing qualities.

definition: simple and honest/unsophisticated/(music etc) deep and resounding
